54415.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「うう…… も～:

54416.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><turn_pc:

87249.「私は 女神の六聖陣のひとり\n 闘戦聖母さまの ご加護を受けた\n お強い冒険:
I am looking for a strong adventurer who has received the blessing of War Mother, one of the Six Saints of the
Goddess. If you have received the blessing of the War Mother and are looking for more power, please come to
me again.

87250.「私 名をミーミと申します。\n あなたさまは 勇敢なる闘戦士\n <pc>さま:
My name is Meemi. You are a brave fighting warrior , aren't you? I am one of the light guides who
help those who have received the blessings of the War Mother to release more power. Light Guides are three
followers who serve the Light Lord, one of the Six Saints, and each of them embodies the spirit of the Lord.
I govern by the Lord's will. The heart to face any difficulties without fear. That is courage. If you wish to attain
power above level 70, please accept the guidance of the three of us. Let us guide you to the release of your
next level of power.

87251.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そうですか。あ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I see. Thank you very much. I pray for
the guidance of light for you.

87252.「そうですか。ありがとうございます。 \n しかし 今のあなたは 他の方からの\:
I see. Thank you very much.But right now you seem to be full of requests from other people. After you have
sorted out your requests, please talk to me again.

87253.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そうですか……それ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I'm sorry to hear that. It's been a
while since I've seen you, Light Lord.
I'm talking about here.

87254.「私は 六聖陣のひとり 聖光教主さまの \n お導きのもと 選ばれし闘戦士に\n:
I am one of the Six Saints, and under the guidance of the Light Lord, I am a light guide to help the chosen
fighting warriors to release their power even more. A light guide is a being that embodies the spirit of the
Light Lord.What I control is the will of the Lord. That is, courage. If you wish to attain power above level 70,
please show me your courage. Like a Guiding Light, I will lead you to the release of your next level of power.

87255.「光導使は 六聖陣のひとり 聖光教主さまに \n お仕えする 従者であるのと同時:
The Light Guide is a follower of the Light Lord, one of the Six Saints, and at the same time, an embodiment of the
Light Lord's spirit. I govern the Light Lord's courage. If you want to release more power, please show me
your courage.

87257.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「それでは 約束:
Then, as promised, under the guidance of the light, we will further unleash your power. Are you ready? I give you
this. When I give the signal, please raise it high.

87258.「そうですか……。\n それでは 準備がととのったら\n 再度 私に話しかけてく:
I see. Then please talk to me again
when you are ready.

87259.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「これで チカラ:
The release of energy is now complete. You may be feeling the energy that is overflowing from within you. With the
guidance of all three of us light guides, you will be able to hold that power in your hands with certainty.

87260.「さて。勇気を示してくださった あなたさまに\n 私たち光導使と 聖光教主さまの:
Now. I would like to tell you a little bit about us light guides and the Light Lord to those of you who have
shown courage.

87261.「闘戦聖母さまにお会いした あなたさまなら \n 六聖陣が 大いなる闇の根源との:
If you have met the War Mother, you know that the Six Saints have been nurturing warriors in preparation for
battle against the great source of darkness. The War Mother is the one who has the task of sifting the
warriors. Only those who have been accepted are qualified to rise to the next level. On the other hand, the
Light Lord whom we serve is hidden for some reason and cannot be seen easily. However, if you keep on aiming high,
he will reveal himself to you sooner or later. However, there are a few steps that need to be taken.

87262.「残念ながら 今はまだ その時ではありません。\n すべての因果は 光の導きによ:
Unfortunately, now is not the time. All causes and effects are predetermined by the guidance of the
light. It is better to aim for Level 81 now, in preparation for the time to come. I strongly, strongly pray that
you will be guided to the Light Lord in time to come!

Cough. May you be guided by the light.
